price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߢߊ߬ߙߊ߫ ߝߊ߬ߕߐ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٖ مَّجۡنُونِۭ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna a-innā latārikū ālihatinā lishāʿirin majnūnin
